title: Offshore Wind Export Cable Routing
description: An engineer needs to plan the optimal route for the subsea export cable from an offshore wind farm to the onshore grid connection point.

tasks.description: Analyze bathymetric (seabed topography) data to identify potential cable routes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies routes that avoid major obstacles and steep gradients.

tasks.description: Identify and map exclusion zones, such as shipping lanes, other subsea cables, and marine protected areas.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a map overlaying the exclusion zones on the potential routes.

tasks.description: Select the shortest possible route that avoids all exclusion zones and minimizes technical challenges.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proposes a final, optimized cable route.
